mapper.select: SELECT t.tradeid, t.quantity, t.executionprice, t.direction, t.cashvalue, t.clientId, t.instrumentid, t.orderId, o.quantity AS orderQuantity, o.targetPrice, o.direction AS orderDirection, o.clientId AS orderClientId, o.instrumentId AS orderInstrumentId FROM cerebros_trades t INNER JOIN cerebros_orders o ON t.orderid = o.orderid WHERE t.clientID = #{clientId} ORDER BY t.tradeid FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY
